page.title: 11School Events in 1984/85
page.content: September 5th School year began. October 1st PTA Annual Meeting. October 12th Harvest Festival. December 1st Hobby Horse (Dancing). December 8th PTA Christmas Fayre. December 11th Concert at Ticehurst. December 13th Carol singing in London December 14th School Christmas Dinner March 22nd Visit to Pont Farm. March 27/28th School Play. May 2nd Visit to Seaford Head. May 13th Bluebell Walk (infants) May 22nd Infants' Music Festival June 6th Country Dancing. June 13th Parents' Consultations. June 20th 'Knockout'at Hastings June 22nd Children's Show. June 25th Juniors' Music Festival June 29th PTA Barbecue. July 1st-6th Visit to Snowdonia. July 18th End of term concert. July 19th End of school year.
